Title: Bottle Shock
Writer: Jody Savin (screenplay), Randall Miller (screenplay), Ross Schwartz (screenplay), Ross Schwartz (story), Lannette Pabon (story), Jody Savin (story), Randall Miller (story)
Actors: Chris Pine, Hal B. Klein, Alan Rickman, Jean-Michel Richaud
Plot: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris".
